attributes.action: Ensure the BBC reinstates Alex Lester/Janice Long and their night time shows.
attributes.background: For cost cutting reasons the BBC have cancelled night time live radio shows including those presented by Alex Lester and Janice Long. Both personalities and their shows provided a service to millions of people who are up or who work through the night.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.

You can find out about the BBC complaints system here:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
